title: Please help me ID these 2 fonts.
content:
HI there,

Can someone please help me ID these fonts? One of them is siple san serif. I like the elegance of this but I really don’t know where to start looking.

The second font is more script-like (Sorry not too sharp a photo) It has also like dirty ascender and descenders. Lovely.

Thank you for looking.
